title: Marc Maron's podcast guest: President Barack Obama - CNNPolitics.com
text:
CNN.com
Marc Maron's podcast guest: President Barack Obama By Kristen Holmes , CNN White House Producer Updated 1533 GMT (2233 HKT) June 18, 2015 Washington (CNN) President Barack Obama is traveling to the West Coast Wednesday, and is scheduled to take part in multiple DNC fundraisers, including one at famous actor/director/media mogul Tyler Perry's home in Los Angeles. But scooping up big donations isn't the only thing on the President's agenda. READ: How the Supreme Court could send Obamacare into a 'death spiral' According to a White House official, the President will also participate in an hour-long plus interview with comedian Marc Maron. Friday morning, the President will stop by the headquarters of Maron's "WTF with Marc Maron" interview podcast, located in a garage in Los Angeles. Maron tweeted this Wednesday, hinting at an announcement of the Presidential interview Thursday morning. The podcast was launched in 2009 and has become hugely popular, hosting a litany of celebrities including comedians Jim Gaffigan, Louie C.K., Lena Dunham, Larry Wilmore and the late Robin Williams. Maron is also set to take his audio podcast to a new video format-- hosting an interview show for Vice called "Vice Portraits" for the new VICE TV network.
